TopicTitle: Nighttime landing no longer a problem.

Articles.Content: Did anyone else know how ridiculous (and awesome) the range on illuminator Mk1's? Just put them face-down on your lander and you should be able to see the ground at ~350m or so.

Yeah. Some people have actually complained about being able to illuminate a planet from orbit, and there are mods on the spaceport with less floodtacular lighting to fix it.

There's a few other options though:

1.) In IVA View, there's a Radar Altimeter on your control panel that shows distance above ground rather than barometric altitude.

2.)Mechjeb's 'surface info' pane has a 'height above ground' item.

3.) Turn your gamma up a bit?
